Text.Value: Mystic Carrion no more. Thrumbo in charge. Better. Much better.

EditorData.NodeContext: Appraising the situation, deciding it's a good thing.

Text.Value: In Mystic Carrion's halls. But not allowed. Customers only.
Mystic Carrion waits. In the salon.
Leave? I don't even know where I am!
Attack.
Hush. No noises. Disturbs the spirits.

EditorData.NodeContext: Urgent - worried about getting in trouble
EditorData.logicalname: HASMET - PERMISSION TO STAY, NOT CUSTOMER

Text.Value: A grave born client. Strange.
Enter then. Saw nothing. Know nothing.
Downstairs, guest. Mystic Carrions waits.
I'm sure I had an invite here somewhere... Must have dropped the bloody thing.
Please, valued customer - enter. Mystic Carrion waits below.
No. No pain. Do not hurt.
Customer always right. Must be kept happy.

EditorData.NodeContext: Remembering his instructions, obviously something that's beeen drilled into him

Text.Value: No pay. None at all.
Told to leave. Intruder. INTRUDER.
I've plenty of gold to spare. Can I become a customer?
Leave.
No. Only special. Only selected.
Master of death. Spirit weaver. Necromancer.
Must leave now. Cannot stay. Forbidden.
Ah, invited. Carrying a letter.

EditorData.NodeContext: Air of recognition - a bit more respectful, now he thinks you're a customer

Text.Value: What do you here?

EditorData.NodeContext: Curious but with a threatening undercurrent. Strange phrasing is intentional - meaning is "What are you doing here?"

Text.Value: Breaking the rules. Get out. GET OUT.
No invitation. No permission. Not expected.

EditorData.NodeContext: Listing the reasons you can't come in

Text.Value: Who's Mystic Carrion? He sounds very dramatic.
No. Not allowed.
House so quiet. Strange.
Let me through, or you're the one who'll be going downstairs. Head first.
Leave. Must leave.

EditorData.NodeContext: Firm, urgent but not yet aggressive

Text.Value: Cannot ask for help. Only take, if offered.
Must leave. Only come by invitation.
Important and rich. Like his clients. Not like you.
Come in. But quick.
Do you really get paid enough to worry about who wanders in that door?

Synopsis: Dialog with Ghast guard in Phildrave's Mansion, where he can give the player access to the whole house checkpoint. He will give access automatically if the player has the letter from father carrion (from Oskar's Beloved) and can also be tricked or intimidated into giving access.
